plot: A war widow attempts to follow traditions and continues to live alone after her husband dies. She relies on her husband's friend to help with some difficulties and the two begin to grow closer treatening the woman's values
title: Gwigeorae
plot_es: A war widow attempts to follow traditions and continues to live alone after her husband dies. She relies on her husband's friend to help with some difficulties and the two begin to grow closer treatening the woman's values
plot_en: A war widow attempts to follow traditions and continues to live alone after her husband dies. She relies on her husband's friend to help with some difficulties and the two begin to grow closer treatening the woman's values
